name: Paracausal Encounter
description:
This is my first foray into making games, let alone using Bitsy. Made over the course of 2 days when I learned what Bitsy was and had my Lancer TTRPG game wrapping up.

If I'm not your GM you probably have no idea what any of this is. Thats okay! Enjoy the spoopy ambiance.

Audio added using the tool made by Mark Wonnacott - https://candle.itch.io/bitsy-audio

Music made by me in Famistudio 2.3.2 - https://bleubleu.itch.io/famistudio

Feel free to use the audio, but please credit me!
